long_description: The Oakley Eyepatch 2 polarized sunglasses-a second-generation rendition of a beloved Oakley original-keep your eyes protected when you're basking in the sun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. Polaric Ellipsoid(TM) geometry maintains razor-sharp clarify along every millimeter of the lenses. Oakley Eyepatch 2 sunglasses feature relatively high 8.75 base-curve lens geometry for optimized peripheral view and side coverage. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Tortoise frames feature polarized bronze-tinted lenses for enhanced contrast in extremely bright light. Polished black frames feature Black Iridium polarized lenses for reduced glare and true color perception in extremely bright light. Reflective Iridium coating enhances optical clarity and contrast, and reduces glare in varying light conditions.
